column1: Novoshakhtinsk (Russian: Новоша́хтинск) is a mining city in Rostov Oblast
column3: located on the border with Ukraine. Population: 111

column1: Within the framework of administrative divisions
column2: it is incorporated as Novoshakhtinsk Urban Okrug—an administrative unit with the status equal to that of the districts. As a municipal division
column3: this administrative unit also has urban okrug status.
